title: Bolsonaro vs. Lula: On Election Day, Brazil Confronts a Momentous Decision
dc:creator: Jack Nicas

media:content.media:credit: Dado Galdieri for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Brazil’s far-right president, Jair Bolsonaro, is seeking a second term as he faces off against a leftist opponent and a former president, Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva.
